/**
     * Removes the first legend in the chart and sends a
     * {@link ChartChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
     *
     * @see #getLegend()
     */

/** * Sets the paint used to fill the chart background and sends a * {@link ChartChangeEvent} to all registered listeners. * * @param paint the paint (null permitted). * * @see #getBackgroundPaint() */

/** * Sets the main title for the chart and sends a {@link ChartChangeEvent} * to all registered listeners. If you do not want a title for the * chart, set it to null. If you want more than one title on * a chart, use the {@link #addSubtitle(Title)} method. * * @param title the title (null permitted). * * @see #getTitle() */
